body: Imagine lecturing people about moral on a Hentai website that also had gore, scat, drug and more fucked up stuff than this. You're comparing real life crime or fictional fetish to a literal drawing, that's like saying killing people in video games equal makes you a murderer.

Think of everything that gives you a boner; Breasts, ass. Whatever it may be, from BBWs to Pantyhose, from Deep Kissing to Femdom etc.
! NTR runs parallel ! It's not sexual excitement, it's a state of panic your psyche goes into when it recognises there's a threat to your prospects of parenthood. The erection achieved is the psyche desperately urging that it passes genetic material before the other subject.
Answering this mental anguish with a strong endorphine release is exceptionally unhealthy. 
And the ones that get a rise from others' anguish, real or in concept, you legitimately are low quality human beings.

See.. this is how you fucking write a GOOD ntr SCENARIO. The writer knows what he/she wants and establishes the world. 
It doesn’t take itself too seriously IN THIS CASE. So I FUCKING know my EXPECTATIONS. 

He’s married. So he’s not some hesitant rando in her life getting second hand “jealousy” which btw isn’t NTR. 
She actually fights back like a real person in love. The dialogue is very believable and BUILDS the tension.
I actually feel bad for her because the pacing of how she transitioned felt real in its world. It really made me feel something. 

Every generic ntr upload this site gets have no substance but “pretty art”. As plain as your mayo cucumber sandwich.
